original_text: And when they had assembled with the elders and taken counsel, they gave a sufficient sum of money to the soldiers
korean_text: 그들이 장로들과 함께 모여 의논하고 군인들에게 돈을 많이 주며

sentences.original_text: And when they had assembled with the elders and taken counsel
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 장로들과 함께 모여 의논했을 때

sentences.original_text: they gave a sufficient sum of money to the soldiers
